submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n=len(nums)
        ans = inf
        b=n//2
        cha=defaultdict(int)

        k2=k+1


        e=defaultdict(int)
        for i in range(b):
            if nums[i]>nums[n-i-1]:
                a=nums[n-i-1]
                b2=nums[i]
            else:
                b2=nums[n-i-1]
                a=nums[i]


            # print(a,b2)
            c=b2-a
            cha[c]+=1



            bian=max(b2, k-a)
            e[bian+1]+=1



        zong=0
        e2={}
        for i, v in sorted(e.items(), key=lambda e:e[0]):
            zong+=v
            e2[i]=zong

        if e2:
            ke=list(e2.keys())
            ke.sort()
            zuixiao=ke[0]
            sort_list = SortedList(ke)
        else:
            zuixiao=inf


        for i,v in cha.items():
            bb=0
            if i>=zuixiao:
                gg=sort_list.bisect_right(i)
                kkk=ke[gg-1]

                bb+=e2.get(kkk,0)

            bb+=(b-v)
            if bb<ans:
                ans=bb


        return ans
